>>The town of Mayville taxes property at a rate of $42 for each $1,000 of estimated value. What is the estimated value of a property on which the owner owes $5,250 in property tax?<< = 125000
[explanation] The number of $1,000 can be found by dividing the property tax by the tax per $1000.
